name: Basic HTML Structure
desc: We'll look into more things we can use HTML elements for and different ways to structure them.
takeaways: i[You can put elements inside of other elements]
Introduce the t[p], t[u], t[b], and t[div] elements
h[t[div]] elements are like containers that don't add extra styling
Learn what the i[basic HTML structure] is

sections.head: What Will We Be Doing in This Lesson?
text: We'll look into more things we can use HTML elements for and different ways to structure them.
